Projects

  • pulsoid allows you to add widget with real-time heart rate to your broadcasts. It is in production and is used by many streamers. Pulsoid is built using cats, Play!, akka-streams.
  • loco is the lightweight event-sourcing library, built on top of cats, cats-effect, tagless-final.
